description: Add global model. Only for China mainland sellers and Korean sellers.

query.name: global_model
query.description: Sku setting for global model. Limit is [1,50].

query.name: weight
query.description: The weight of this global model, the unit is KG. If don't set the weight of this global model, will use the weight of global item by default. If set the dimension of this global model, them must set the weight of this global model.

query.name: dimension
query.description: The dimension of this global model. If don't set the dimension of this global model, will use the dimension of global item by default.

query.name: package_height
query.description: The height of package for this global model, the unit is CM.

query.name: package_length
query.description: The length of package for this global model, the unit is CM.

query.name: package_width
query.description: The width of package for this global model, the unit is CM.

query.name: pre_order
query.description: Pre-order information of this global model. Notes: If don't set the DTS of this global model, will use the DTS of the global item by default.

query.name: days_to_ship
query.description: Days to ship. Please get the days_to_ship range from the get_dts_limit API.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.
